name: implicit
posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

dsense.name: implicit
dsense.posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

example.eg: He interpreted her comments as an implicit criticism of the government.
example.egtrans: 他将她的评论理解为对政府的含蓄批评。

example.eg: Implicit in the poem's closing lines are the poet's own religious doubts.
example.egtrans: 在这首诗最后几行中隐含着诗人自己的宗教疑虑。

dsense.name: implicit
dsense.posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

example.eg: All her life she had implicit faith in socialism.
example.egtrans: 她一生都坚定地信仰社会主义。
